title: TOPTREK USB Rechargeable Bike Light 500 Lumens Bicycle CREE LED Headlight,Easy To Install for Kids Men Women Cycling Front light Waterproof

description: -- Utilizing American branded CREE LED. Insuring best ration curve between luminous intensity and energy consumption. --Made Li-ion Batterey -- Ensuring battery more safe more endurable by fully testing and certification. -- More upscale. Better heat dissipation. -- Easily switch between horizontal light beam mode and vertical light beam mode. which can make your bike light more effectively and more safe. -- This design is not just a decoration. which make you be seen easily by aroud motorist. -- For front light, the indicator of on/off button turns red when the power remaining 20%. -- No need to purchase batteries any more.Our front light can be charged with USB cable from your computer or devices with USB port.(USB cable included) -- Passes the IPX5 waterproof specifications.(IPX4 – Protects from spurt water, no matter the direction) LED:CREE LED Battery:Custom-made Li-ion, 3000mAh/3.7V/3W Lumen:500 lumens Run Time:single light=6 hours，twin lights=3 hours Waterproof:IPX5 Weight:168.5g Size:93.3*57.8*30.5mm Mode:left light mode/right light mode/twin lights mode/hold for 2 seconds to closed 1 USB Bike Light 1 Mount 1 Charging cable 1 USER Manual
